contribution_desc:
This is a very concise (or super short note) describing two use cases:

- Collaborative browsing of documents
- Collaborative browsing of web pages

Each use case is based on UI content distribution. For example, the distribution of a Word document across different mobile devices (i.e. PDAs) with one device showing the document outline and another one showing the pages overview and yet another one showing the content of a page.

The paper itself, however, doesn't describe the implementation of the system.
use_cases_desc:
- Collaborative browsing of documents
- Collaborative browsing of web pages
device_mount: Handheld; Placed loosely around user (e.g., table)
